 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package alphabetsoup.base

Interface Summary
BucketbotBase.BucketbotState BucketbotState is interface which should be inherited to provied states for the Bucketbot to be in.
 

Class Summary
BucketBase BucketBase is the basic and fully capable implementation of a passive Bucket.
BucketbotBase BucketbotBase provides the basic functionality for a passive bucketbot.
BucketbotTask BucketbotTask is a class which describes the major tasks which can be "physically" completed (physically meaning via bucketbots, buckets, and stations).
LetterStationBase LetterStationBase implements the basic functionality of a passive Letter station, such that it can receive letters when given them by the system, and will place letters in buckets when requested to do so.
SummaryReport SummaryReport is a class of static functions to generate reports of statistics and simulation data.
WordListBase WordListBase implements basic functionality of the WordList, such as loading a word list from a file, and generating letters and words.
WordStationBase WordStationBase implements the basic functionality of a passive Word station, such that it can take letters from buckets when requested, clears words when complete, and can be assigned new words when space permits.
 

Enum Summary
BucketbotTask.TaskType TaskType is the type of task, and indicates the meaning of each of the fields of this class.
